column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The Q's shared: Goat cheese baked in a delicious tomato sauce and toasted garlic bread
column2: seared sea scallops with leeks and seared oranges
column3: & beef tenderloin & blue cheese. All delicious along with their delicious homemade bread
column4: great drinks and lively atmosphere made for a great dinner. They also have many flavored sangria and a variety of paella to choose from.
